body_html:
This isn't related to your bug, but note the warning

*** WARNING *** You are using ptxas 9.0.176, which is in range [9.0.0, 9.0.276) + [9.1.0, 9.1.121). These versions are known to miscompile XLA code, leading to incorrect results or invalid-address errors.

This is sadly not a joke.

body:
This isn't related to your bug, but note the warning

> *** WARNING *** You are using ptxas 9.0.176, which is in range [9.0.0, 9.0.276) + [9.1.0, 9.1.121). These versions are known to miscompile XLA code, leading to incorrect results or invalid-address errors.

This is sadly not a joke.
